ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... At 15th level I think it might be Gubby Shralok(?). Captain is a bit tougher than that... Good Journey, Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule) 8)-----Original
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... At 15th level I think it might be Gubby Shralok(?). Captain is a bit
tougher than that...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Doug Donaldson [mailto:doug@...]
8)Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 12:07 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
8)
8)
8)From: Doug Donaldson <doug@...>
8)
8)At 12:56 PM 07/12/1999 -0400, you wrote:
8)>From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
8)>
8)>Ok, I'm going to have to ask for even more spoiler. :) I've been to
8)>Kithicor a couple of times, and besides some ruins
8)(stonehenge kind) having
8)>some rather easy (for a lvl 14 druid, and lvl 14 cleric)
8)mummies and green
8)>skels, and occasional green skels that pop up around the
8)lake, we haven't
8)>been able to find any more critters worth beating up on. A
8)few blue spiders
8)>or snakes (can't remember exactly), few & far between.
8)>
8)>So what good IS Kithicor? I'm not being a smartass or
8)sarcastic, I'd really
8)>like to know. Please give me some ideas WHERE is good in there.
8)
8)
8)On my way to Highpass one night, I was running along the edge
8)of the zone
8)and just past the lake and close to the Highpass entrance, I saw a
8)unique,named orc that conned white to my level 15 Bard.
8)Anyone know who
8)this was? I wish I could remember name but it eludes me.
8)
8)
8)
